review: I bought this when they were $19.95 and it has worked great for months but recently the video would freeze. Called tech about the problem but they did not know what to do about it, tech even called me back but they never solved the problem. I've reset the device but that didn't help. I think it could be the firmware or just a defective unit. Amazon should replace it under warranty but will not. I can't buy a product from a company if they don't stand by their warranty.

review: We love our Amazon Fire Stick. So much, that we have eliminated our cable bill altogether and choose to just use Netflix, Hulu and Amazon Prime Plus. I was a little apprehensive about how well this would all work together but it is awesome and is saving us over $100 per month. I am going to say something pretty obvious here, (but for those less "technically inclined")--Make sure you have Internet capabilities to support audio and video streaming at a fairly rapid rate, so that you don't run into any hiccups. All you do is call your current Internet provider, who will help you figure this out:)
author: Angela M Brown
